form.title: Deposit
form.description: Select payment method and enter deposit information

noteItems.checkInfo: Please check the information carefully before making the transaction.
noteItems.processingTime: Deposit requests will be processed within 24 working hours.
noteItems.txidRequired: Transaction ID (TxID) is required to verify your transaction.
noteItems.transferContent: Please make sure to use the correct transfer content:
noteItems.support: If you encounter any issues with your deposit, please contact support.

form.paymentNoticeDesc: After confirmation, a new tab will open with our secure payment page.

paymentMethods.onlineDesc: Pay through online methods (Bank cards, E-wallets, QR Code)

wallet.networkWarningTrc20: Please only transfer USDT through the TRC20 network
wallet.networkWarningErc20: ERC20 network gas fees may be high, please check before transferring
wallet.transferContentWarning: Please enter the correct transfer content
wallet.txidHelp: Transaction ID can be found in your wallet's transaction history
wallet.enterBankId: Enter bank transaction ID to verify
wallet.instructionsDescTrc20: Please transfer your USDT using the TRC20 network to our wallet address. We'll process your deposit once we confirm the transaction.
wallet.instructionsDescErc20: Please transfer your USDT using the ERC20 network to our wallet address. We'll process your deposit once we confirm the transaction.
wallet.unitHelp: Please select the currency unit you will use for payment

bankInfo.enterAmountForQR: Enter amount to display QR code

detail.title: Transaction details
detail.pendingDescription: Your deposit transaction is being processed. This process may take up to 24 hours. Please check back later.
detail.balanceUpdated: Your account balance has been updated with the deposited amount.

failed.title: Payment failed
failed.defaultError: An error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again later.
failed.whatHappenedDesc: Your payment was declined or an error occurred during the payment process. This could be due to insufficient funds, payment restrictions, or technical issues.
failed.checkPaymentMethod: Check your payment method information and ensure you have sufficient funds
failed.tryAgainLater: Try again later or use a different payment method
failed.contactSupport: Contact customer support if the problem persists
